txt.en: Talk to Durin and participate in the Dwarrowmoot
Talk to Durin before the battle is joined
'Longbeards! Zhélruka! Stout-axes!\n\n'Hear me now! I call for Dwarrow-moot!'
It is time at last for the Dwarrowmoot to begin.
'Hrímil's armies approach, [placeholder]! Now the fate of Gundabad will be decided!'
Chapter 11.3: The Voice of the Dragon
Durin stands at the Thing-fold, prepared to begin the Dwarrowmoot.
Durin stands near the Thing-fold, readying himself and his people for battle.
